title: Blessing in Disguise
desc:
Round 135
**Blessing in Disguise**
- The target gets their backmost charge replaced with 1 <:prismatic:1244305441274724533>, which will turn into a <:bible_charge:1247285101474353402> when hit.
- However, nobody will know this happens, and it looks and acts as a <:blank:1240849815823450112> otherwise. (adding to the blank counter instead of the special one)
- **Safe** (obviously)
